reason: Vector space structure implicit: If A_0 is an algebra over C, it must be a vector space over C. Should explicitly state: (1) A_0 is a C-vector space with operations +, ·. (2) Addition is commutative and associative. (3) There exists 0 ∈ A_0 with a + 0 = a. (4) Each a has additive inverse -a. Standard but not stated.
